abbreviation for pain in the arse: used, for example on social media and in text messages, to refer to someone or something that is annoying: Deeply held beliefs are no excuse for being a PITA. It was a real PITA to then get the sugar into the mixing bowl.
More examplesFewer examplesLast time I checked being a PITA wasn't a crime.It's kind of a PITA to have to order them every 6 months.The food is definitely worth going back for in spite of the PITA parking.
